The one-time event Illithid Invasion is active across all servers! See here for more!

Allegience of the Wild Hunt
  • +2 Enhancement Bonus+2 Enhancement Bonus: +2 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Fortification +59%Fortification +59%: +59% Enhancement bonus to reduced chance of taking critical damage on a critical hit.
  • Physical Sheltering +9 Physical Sheltering +9: +9 Enhancement bonus to Physical Resistance Rating
  • Reflex Save +4 Reflex Save +4: This item gives a +4 Resistance bonus to your Reflex saves.
  • Dodge +4% Dodge +4%: +4% Enhancement bonus to Dodge.
  • Blue Augment Slot: EmptyBlue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
 5 7 11 0 10% LeatherLeather: Leather armor is made of the hide of animals. It provides decent protection without excessively restricting the user's movements. Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire The Legend of the Lost Locket, End chest
Arcane Armor
  • +6 Enhancement Bonus+6 Enhancement Bonus: +6 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Wizardry VWizardry V: This item grants the wearer +125 maximum spell points. Sorcerers and Favored Souls gain up to double spell points from items.
  • Exceptional Constitution +1Exceptional Constitution +1: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +1 exceptional bonus to Constitution.
  • Exceptional Intelligence +1Exceptional Intelligence +1: This item focuses the power of the wearer's mind, granting a +1 exceptional bonus to Intelligence.
  • Arcane Casting DexterityArcane Casting Dexterity: This ability reduces the arcane spell failure chance by -10%.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
 18 +10 8 0 10% LeatherLeather: Leather armor is made of the hide of animals. It provides decent protection without excessively restricting the user's movements. Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire Fashion Madness, End chest

  • +4 Enhancement Bonus+4 Enhancement Bonus: +4 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Blue Augment Slot: EmptyBlue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16

    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57

    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
  • Sneak Attack Bonus +2Sneak Attack Bonus +2: Provides a +2 to attack bonus and a +3 to damage for any attack that would qualify as a Sneak Attack, even if the wielder is not a Rogue.
  • Armor-Piercing - 10% Armor-Piercing - 10%: Passive: +10% Enhancement bonus to Fortification Bypass. (Fortification Bypass makes your attacks ignore a percentage of enemy Fortification.)

Battleworn Chainshirt
  • MasterworkMasterwork: This armor is more finely crafted than normal, reducing the Armom Check Penalty by 1.
  • StarterStarter: Starter equipment cannot be traded, sold or crafted.
    This item cannot be fed to sentient jewels.
 1 +4 5 -1 20% SteelSteel: Steel is the common metal used to make weapons and armor. Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire The Grotto, Sahuagin High Priestess's chest
Black Dragonhide Armor
  • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Haste GuardHaste Guard: When you are hit by enemies, there is a chance you will be Hasted, quickening your attack and movement speed.
  • Armor-Piercing - 10% Armor-Piercing - 10%: Passive: +10% Enhancement bonus to Fortification Bypass. (Fortification Bypass makes your attacks ignore a percentage of enemy Fortification.)
  • Relentless FuryRelentless Fury: While this item is equipped, any killing blows you strike against enemies may drive you into a furious rage, providing a 5% Enchantment damage bonus to your melee, ranged and unarmed attacks for 30 seconds. Slaying weaker opponents has a reduced chance of producing this effect.
  • Acid Resistance +30Acid Resistance +30: Passive: +30 Enhancement bonus to your Acid Resistance.
 14 +11 12 0 10% Black DragonscaleBlack Dragonscale: Items crafted from the scales of black dragons often grant their owners resistance to damage from acid. Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Black Dragonscale Armor
Blue Dragonhide Armor
  • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Spell Penetration II Spell Penetration II: Passive: +2 Equipment bonus to Spell Penetration checks.
  • Spell Lore VISpell Lore VI: Passive: All of your spells gain a 6% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Potency +52Potency +52: Passive: +52 Equipment bonus to each Spell Power.
  • Electric Resistance +30Electric Resistance +30: Passive: +30 Enhancement bonus to your Electric Resistance.
 14 +11 12 0 10% Blue DragonscaleBlue Dragonscale: Items crafted from the scales of blue dragons often grant their owners resistance to damage from electricity. Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Blue Dragonscale Armor
Breastplate of Destruction
  • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • MithralMithral: Mithral armor is one type lighter then normal. Arcane Spell Failure decreased by 10%. Maximum dexterity bonus increased by 2. Armor check penalty reduced by 3.
  • Protection +4Protection +4: Passive: +4 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
  • DestructionDestruction: On Hit: Your target gains a stack of Armor Destruction. (-1 penalty to Armor Class, -1% of its Fortification. 20 Second Duration. Stacks up to 15 times.) This effect may trigger once every three seconds.
 14 +19 8 0 15% MithralMithral: Mithral armor is one type lighter then normal. Arcane Spell Failure decreased by 10%. Maximum dexterity bonus increased by 2. Armor check penalty reduced by 3.   • CripplingCrippling: A crippling weapon is infused with binding power so that when a target is critically hit their movement is slowed by half.
    Note: Real slowdown is only 25%

Chainmail of the First Snow
  • +15 Enhancement Bonus+15 Enhancement Bonus: +15 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Fortification +142%Fortification +142%: +142% Enhancement bonus to reduced chance of taking critical damage on a critical hit.
  • Physical Sheltering +33 Physical Sheltering +33: +33 Enhancement bonus to Physical Resistance Rating
  • Competence Healing Amplification +53Healing Amplification: This effect amplifies all incoming positive energy healing by +53 (Competence bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.
  • False Life +50 False Life +50: +50 Enhancement bonus to hit points.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments

    • 2 Pieces Equipped: +30 Artifact bonus to Physical Resistance Rating
    • 3 Pieces Equipped: +30 Artifact bonus to Healing, Repair, and Negative Amplification
    • 4 Pieces Equipped: +10% Legendary bonus to maximum hitpoints
    • 5 Pieces Equipped: +100% Artifact bonus to Threat Generation
    • 6 Pieces Equipped: +3 Artifact bonus to Constitution
    • 7 Pieces Equipped: +15% Artifact bonus to Armor Class
 29 25 22 0 10% LeatherLeather: Leather armor is made of the hide of animals. It provides decent protection without excessively restricting the user's movements. Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire The Feywild, Feytwisted chests
Cormyrian Green Dragonhide Armor
  • +6 Enhancement Bonus+6 Enhancement Bonus: +6 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Vitality +20Vitality +20: Passive: +20 Vitality bonus to Hit Points.
  • Acid Resistance +40Acid Resistance +40: Passive: +40 Enhancement bonus to your Acid Resistance.
  • Acid Absorption +20% Acid Absorption +20%: Passive: 20% Enhancement Bonus to Acid Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
  • Resistance +6 Resistance +6: Passive: +6 Resistance bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.
  • Proof Against Poison +10 Proof Against Poison +10: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +10 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 11 + their Fortitude save).
  • Power StorePower Store: This item collects and stores magical energy. Any spellcaster can use this energy to partially power their spells. All spells cast while using this item receive an enhancement bonus of -10% to their spell point costs.
 23 +15 15 0 10% Green DragonscaleGreen Dragonscale: Items crafted from the scales of green dragons often grant their owners resistance to damage from poison. Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Mikrom Sum: Purple Dragon Knight Patron Vendor
Cormyrian Red Dragonhide Armor
  • +6 Enhancement Bonus+6 Enhancement Bonus: +6 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Vitality +20Vitality +20: Passive: +20 Vitality bonus to Hit Points.
  • Fire Resistance +40Fire Resistance +40: Passive: +40 Enhancement bonus to your Fire Resistance.
  • Fire Absorption +20% Fire Absorption +20%: Passive: 20% Enhancement Bonus to Fire Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
  • Protection +6Protection +6: Passive: +6 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
  • Fortification +100%Fortification +100%: This suit of armor or shield produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer much more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a 100% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally.
  • Seeker +10 Seeker +10: Provides a +10 Enhancement bonus to confirm critical hits, and a +10 Enhancement bonus to critical hit damage (before multipliers are applied).

  • Upgradeable - Tier 1

  • Proof Against Poison +8 Proof Against Poison +8: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +8 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 9 + their Fortitude save).

Epic Duelist's Leathers (Level 20)
  • Upgradeable - Tier 1
  • +6 Enhancement Bonus+6 Enhancement Bonus: +6 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Feat: MobilityFeat: Mobility: While equipped this armor grants the wielder the Mobility feat: increases the maximum dexterity bonus permitted by armor and tower shields by 2, adds a +4 bonus to Armor Class while tumbling, and gain a 2% dodge bonus.
  • Balance +15Balance +15: Passive: +15 Competence bonus to the Balance skill.
  • Superior NimblenessSuperior Nimbleness: This suit of armor looks much less restrictive than others of its type. A suit of armor that has this property has a maximum Dexterity bonus 4 higher than normal, and its armor check penalty is reduced by 4.
  • Dodge +6% Dodge +6%: +6% Enhancement bonus to Dodge.
  • Attack Bonus +2Attack Bonus +2: Provides a +2 competence bonus to your attack rolls.

      • Superior NimblenessSuperior Nimbleness: This suit of armor looks much less restrictive than others of its type. A suit of armor that has this property has a maximum Dexterity bonus 6 higher than normal, and its armor check penalty is reduced by 4.
    • Upgradeable - Tier 3
      • Dodge +6% Dodge +6%: +6% Enhancement bonus to Dodge. → Dodge +8% Dodge +8%: +8% Enhancement bonus to Dodge.

Epic Duelist's Leathers (level 28)
  • +12 Enhancement Bonus+12 Enhancement Bonus: +12 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Feat: MobilityFeat: Mobility: While equipped this armor grants the wielder the Mobility feat: increases the maximum dexterity bonus permitted by armor and tower shields by 2, adds a +4 bonus to Armor Class while tumbling, and gain a 2% dodge bonus.
  • Balance +19Balance +19: Passive: +19 Competence bonus to the Balance skill.
  • Accuracy +20 Accuracy +20: Passive: +20 Competence bonus to attack rolls
  • Dodge +12% Dodge +12%: +12% Enhancement bonus to Dodge.
  • Blue Augment Slot: EmptyBlue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
 28 21 20* 0 10% LeatherLeather: Leather armor is made of the hide of animals. It provides decent protection without excessively restricting the user's movements. Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire Treasure of Crystal Cove
Epic Energized Leather Armor
  • +11 Enhancement Bonus+11 Enhancement Bonus: +11 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Electric Absorption +30% Electric Absorption +30%: Passive: 30% Enhancement Bonus to Electric Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
  • Resistance +12 Resistance +12: Passive: +12 Resistance bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.
  • Upgradeable Item (Temple of Elemental Evil)Upgradeable Item (Temple of Elemental Evil): This item can be upgraded. Bring this item to the Overgrown Workbench in the Temple of Elemental Evil and combine it with Rusty Gilled Mushrooms to upgrade the item to a more powerful form.
    • Lesser DisplacementLesser Displacement: Equipping this item causes light to distort around you. Attacks from enemies have a 25% chance to miss you due to concealment.
    • Fortification +150%Fortification +150%: +150% Enhancement bonus to reduced chance of taking critical damage on a critical hit.
    • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
      • Named: Category:Green augments
      Blue Augments
      • Named: Category:Blue augments
      • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
      • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
      • Fortification: +25% to +100%
      • Good Luck: +1 or +2
      • Hit points: +4 to +54
      • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
      • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
      • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
      • Dodge: +1% to +14%
      • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
      • Accuracy: +2 to +22
      • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
      Yellow Augments
      • Named: Category:Yellow augments
      • Deathblock
      • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
      • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
      • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
      • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
      • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
      • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
      • Damage: +1 to +11
      • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
      Colorless Augments
      • Named: Category:Colorless augments
      • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
      • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
      • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
      • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

      +20 Quality bonus to Melee Power
      +20 Quality bonus to Ranged Power
      +20 Quality bonus to Universal Spell Power

Epic Illicit Warding Armor
  • +10 Enhancement Bonus+10 Enhancement Bonus: +10 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Fire Shield (Cold) Miss-GuardFire Shield (Cold) Miss-Guard: When you are missed, there is a 10% chance that a Fire Shield (Cold) will be cast on you. If this effect activates while you have an active Fire Shield (Hot) from another source, they will nullify each other.
  • Constitution +11 Constitution +11: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +11 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
  • Lesser DisplacementLesser Displacement: Equipping this item causes light to distort around you. Attacks from enemies have a 25% chance to miss you due to concealment.
  • Spell Resistance +26 Spell Resistance +26: +26 Enhancement bonus to Spell Resistance.

  • +6 Enhancement Bonus+6 Enhancement Bonus: +6 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Seeker +9 Seeker +9: Provides a +9 Enhancement bonus to confirm critical hits, and a +9 Enhancement bonus to critical hit damage (before multipliers are applied).
  • Shatter +11Shatter +11: This effect gives a +11 enhancement bonus to the DC to resist the character's Sunder and Improved Sunder attempts.
  • Sheltering +24 Sheltering +24: +24 Enhancement bonus to Physical and Magical Resistance Ratings
  • DRDamage Reduction 15/Good: Reduces physical damage by 15, except from Good aligned attacks. 15/Good
  • DRDamage Reduction 15/Lawful: Reduces physical damage by 15, except from Lawful aligned attacks. 15/Lawful

Epic Mummy Wrappings
  • +6 Enhancement Bonus+6 Enhancement Bonus: +6 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Proof Against Disease +8 Proof Against Disease +8: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural diseases. This item also grants a +8 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical diseases, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical diseases with a DC of less than 9 + their Fortitude save).
  • Profane Lifeforce +32Profane Lifeforce +32: +32 Profane bonus to Hit Points.
  • Physical Sheltering +24 Physical Sheltering +24: +24 Enhancement bonus to Physical Resistance Rating
  • Immunity to FearImmunity to Fear: The wearer of this item is immune to all fear effects.
  • FearsomeFearsome: This item causes those who strike the user to be overcome with terror, as from the Fear spell.

Epic Rakshasa Hide
  • +6 Enhancement Bonus+6 Enhancement Bonus: +6 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • RoarRoar: This item emits a frightening roar when melee attackers score a critical hit on the wearer, causing them to resist or be shaken with fear.
  • Heightened Awareness 4Heightened Awareness 4: This item helps you to quickly read situations with sharpness and clarity, allowing you to predict actions before they occur. You gain a +4 Insight bonus to AC.
  • Superior NimblenessSuperior Nimbleness: This suit of armor looks much less restrictive than others of its type. A suit of armor that has this property has a maximum Dexterity bonus 4 higher than normal, and its armor check penalty is reduced by 4.
  • Accuracy +15 Accuracy +15: Passive: +15 Competence bonus to attack rolls
  • Rough Hide +3Rough Hide +3: This item fuses with your body and toughens your skin, providing a +3 Primal bonus to your natural armor.

Epic Red Dragonhide Armor
  • +6 Enhancement Bonus+6 Enhancement Bonus: +6 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Eternal FireEternal Fire: While you are wearing this item, your melee, ranged, and unarmed attacks gain the Flaming Burst ability. (This weapon is sheathed in fire. The weapon deals an additional 1 to 6 fire damage each hit. In addition, critical hits deal an additional 1 to 10 fire damage for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 2 to 20 for a x3 critical multiplier and 3 to 30 for a x4 multiplier.)
  • Fire Lore +16%Fire Lore +16: Passive: Your Fire spells gain a 16% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Combustion +111Combustion +111: Passive: +111 Equipment bonus to Fire Spell Power.
  • Fire Resistance +36Fire Resistance +36: Passive: +36 Enhancement bonus to your Fire Resistance.
  • Fire Guard IIFire Guard II: When Hit in Melee: Deals 2 to 8 Fire damage to your attacker.
  • Incineration GuardIncineration Guard: This item stores the power of a raging inferno deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this destructive power occasionally comes to the surface, devastating enemies with massive fire damage.

  • +15 Enhancement Bonus+15 Enhancement Bonus: +15 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Improved Deception +20Improved Deception: This item makes your weapons hard to focus upon and thus provides a +20 enhancement bonus to Bluff checks. In addition, while using this item your weapons have a chance to envelop the target in darkness, making them vulnerable to sneak attacks for a short time.

This item also grants a +5 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical diseases, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical diseases with a DC of less than 6 + their Fortitude save).

Parasitic Breastplate
  • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Symbiotic FlexibilitySymbiotic Flexibility: Because this suit of armor has merged with your body, the flexibility it affords you is practically unparalleled. A suit of armor that has this property has a maximum Dexterity bonus 4 higher than normal, and its armor check penalty is reduced by 4.
  • Diehard Diehard: If you are incapacitated while this item is equipped, it will automatically stabilize you as if you had the Diehard feat.
  • Trace of MadnessTrace of Madness: You can almost hear faint, panicked voices when this item is close to you. Perhaps the latent power of this item's hint of madness could be brought out by some catalyst.
  • Symbiotic BacklashSymbiotic Backlash: This item is symbiotic and grants you benefits, but it also deals 2 to 12 extra damage to you when enemies roll a 20 on an attack against you.
  • Rough Hide +3Rough Hide +3: This item fuses with your body and toughens your skin, providing a +3 Primal bonus to your natural armor.

Restored Dragoncraft Leather Armor
  • +6 Enhancement Bonus+6 Enhancement Bonus: +6 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Fortification +100%Fortification +100%: This suit of armor or shield produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer much more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a 100% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally.
  • Protection +7Protection +7: Passive: +7 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
  • Shield +6Shield +6: While this item is equipped, you are partially protected by a field of magical force which can deflect enemy attacks. This item provides a +6 Shield bonus to Armor Class. It does not stack with an equipped shield.

A suit of armor imbued with this property never tarnishes and is immune to acid damage and rusting effects, like-wise weapons made with this will not be easily damaged by Rust Monsters either. This item also grants a +4 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 5 + their Fortitude save).

  • Freedom of MovementFreedom of Movement: This item grants its wearer the ability to move and attack normally while under the influence of magic that impedes movement, such as paralysis, solid fog, slow and web.

  • +15 Enhancement Bonus+15 Enhancement Bonus: +15 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • DeathblockDeathblock: The wearer of this item is immune to all death spells and magical death effects.
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.

Whisperchain (Level 16)
  • +4 Enhancement Bonus+4 Enhancement Bonus: +4 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • BlurryBlurry: Equipping this item causes you to become slightly blurry. Attacks from enemies have a 20% chance to miss you due to concealment.
  • EtherealEthereal: Equipping this item causes your hands and weapons to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets.
  • Improved False LifeImproved False Life: This item grants the wearer +20 maximum health.
  • Insightful Sneak Attack Bonus +1Insightful Sneak Attack Bonus +1: Provides a +1 Insight modifier to your attack bonus and a +2 Insight bonus to damage for any attack that would qualify as a Sneak Attack, even if the wielder is not a Rogue.
  • Heightened Awareness 3Heightened Awareness 3: This item helps you to quickly read situations with sharpness and clarity, allowing you to predict actions before they occur. You gain a +3 Insight bonus to AC.

  • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Fortification +100%Fortification +100%: This suit of armor or shield produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer much more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a 100% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally.
  • Protection +5Protection +5: Passive: +5 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
  • Shield +4Shield +4: While this item is equipped, you are partially protected by a field of magical force which can deflect enemy attacks. This item provides a +4 Shield bonus to Armor Class. It does not stack with an equipped shield.
  • Cold Resistance +30Cold Resistance +30: Passive: +30 Enhancement bonus to your Cold Resistance.

    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
 6 +7 8 0 10% LeatherLeather: Leather armor is made of the hide of animals. It provides decent protection without excessively restricting the user's movements. Bound to Character on EquipBound to Character on Equip: This item is Bound to Character on Equip Caverns of Korromar, Horus Hammercrush's chest
⇑   ⇑   Back to top   ⇑   ⇑
